ComicInfo.Title: Bingo Was His Name, Oh No---Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Where did Bingo take Jughead when he was near death after he was shot by Archie? As the epic first season of JUGHEAD: THE HUNGER comes to a close, that mystery will be resolved-and the answer will only raise even more questions about Jughead and his werewolf legacy! It's all part of our big finale, leading up into our mind blowing JUGHEAD: THE HUNGER VS VAMPIRONICA crossover!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Adam Gorham | 1 | B | Cover B | Vic Malhotra | 2 | C | Cover C | Greg Scott & Kelly Fitzpatrick | 3 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Segura, Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Veronica Lodge
